title: Ticket #2136: [Debian] GCC 4.5 refuses to compile SOAP caused by const-type mismatch
description: There is a problem in daemonCore's soap_core where a const soap* is passed into soap_copy although soap_copy does not take a const. This does not really bother previous versions of GCC but GCC 4.5 trips over it and reports a compile error.
remarks:
2011-May-20 16:35:26 by mih:
That fixes the problem. Thanks.
check_ins: 2011-May-19 17:56   Check-in [21925]: Cast soap pointer to non-const, as this will cause problems with newer gcc versions #2136 (By Cathrin Weiss )
creator: cweiss
